title: Where does BTS shop for their clothes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mostly online. They do occasionally shop in stores, but not very often. Brands they often wear are Givenchy, Mastermind, Supreme, Adidas, Gucci Topshop, Puma and H&M. I suggest your check out their online shops, if you want to see what the brands have to offer.

Online. They dont have a particular brand except when they have work and are dressed by a stylist. I think Jimin and Hobi are the big spender in terms of fashion. They can be seen wearing expensive, luxury brands on regular days. No issue with that. If i have that amount of money, my closet would be amazing too! Haha
